tier.item: b. i'o mo coni, la aeocU mooeai to (Snake:275)
Nom R.AF one Hab in_advance make.AF Obl
mo tacvohi ci kaapana to mo mameoi
R.AF long Rl bamboo_pole Obl AF old
ho mahteUcU ci kaapana.
Conj solid.AF Rl bamboo_pole
tena c'u poamo'ofeihni to kaapana
Irr Asp make_stretch_along.PF Obl bamboo
'o mo sUmcU ci teesi to o'a te lUa
Nom R.AF firm.AF Rl rope Obl Neg Irr easily
antUhU.
break
ho ta-he cu paepo'isa to pempingna
Irr-3rd.pl Asp tie_with_rop.AF Obl top
Conj
to kaapana ho eskoveia na i'o teesi
Gen bamboo_pole Conj draw_a_coil.PF DM Nom rope
ho poa-yafeongoa
Conj Cau-make_circle.PF
"(They) make a long bamboo pole in advance, an old and solid
bamboo pole. Then, (they) make a firm rope, which will not
easily break, stretched along the bamboo pole. Then they tie
the top of the bamboo pole and draw a coil with the rope, and
they make a circle."
b. i'o mo coni, la aeocU mooeai to (Snake:275)

bamboo pole. Then, (they) make a firm rope, which will not
easily break, stretched along the bamboo pole. Then they tie
the top of the bamboo pole and draw a coil with the rope, and

break
ho ta-he cu paepo'isa to pempingna
Conj Irr-3rd.pl Asp tie_with_rop.AF Obl top
to kaapana ho eskoveia na i'o teesi
Gen bamboo_pole Conj draw_a_coil.PF DM Nom rope
ho poa-yafeongoa
Conj Cau-make_circle.PF

(They) make a long bamboo pole in advance, an old and solid bamboo pole. Then, (they) make a firm rope, which will not easily break, stretched along the bamboo pole. Then they tie the top of the bamboo pole and draw a coil with the rope, and they make a circle.

(field notes)
